name: Study With Me [ Demo ]
description:
Visual novel-productivity app hybrid. Learn how to maximize your efficiency with the Pomodoro technique... and make friends while you're at it.

<Focus Mode>

A preset Pomodoro timer, together with a selection of ambient tracks that's designed to help you relax and focus. Currently with three different locations implemented.

<Story Mode>

Complete study sessions to improve your relationships with your study buddies and progress the story. Currently only Day 0 has been implemented.

This build is a proof-of-concept demo - please let me know if you have any feedback or have ideas for more features that'd help you be more productive!

Credits
